import React, { useState } from "react"; import './form.css'; function Form({ cardName, setCardName ,number,setNumber,month,setMonth,year,setYear,cvc,setCvc}){ return (
setCardName (e.target.value)} />
setNumber(e.target.value)} />
setMonth(e.target.value)} />
setYear(e.target.value)} />
setCvc(e.target.value)} />
); } export default Form;
